document_data.name: Balbaste Avithoul
document_data.mainbody: ring the [[Darkening]], Balbaste allied with [[House Szind]] and [[Dun'Robar]] and contributed her house's forces to the attack on [[Eveningstar]], with a special focus on capturing surfacers for slavery. When the counterattack came, it was through an unexpected source: her former slave [[Mirini Elemys]]. Mirini had earned the "affection" of her mistress, and was henceforth kept close to more easily play with. This gave Mirini a good look at the layout of House Avithoul and Balbaste's magical devices, allowing the [[elf]] to steal a ''[[wand of invisibility]]'' and use a ''[[portal]]'' to escape the city. When Mirini reached Eveningstar, she worked with the [[Wizard of War]] [[Aptem Mews]] to send a team of [[adventurer]]s back to House Avithoul, where they caused a slave revolt, destroyed their treasures, and killed countless house members.
